description:
I knew from the moment I met Stu that I wanted to see his hairy ass get fucked!
I mean, he’s just adorable from head to toe. Cute, boyish face, muscular body, great ass and hairy legs.
Of course, he was hesitant. The straight boys always are.
He had a lot of fun with Aidan, so the curiosity was definitely there.
“What is it going to feel like?” he asked me.
“It’s different for everyone,” I replied. “It’s intense, but I think you’ll like it.”
Pavel was excited too.
“He’s really cute,” he said after meeting Stu. “I’m stoked!”
If you are a fan of furry butts you will love this film!
title: Stu & Pavel: Bareback
